revision.text:
{{ZScriptNote}} '''[[Structs:SecPlane|SecPlane]]'''
native bool '''isSlope'''() const
==Usage== Used to tell if a SecPlane is sloped i.e. it's not pointing straight up or down.
===Return Value=== Returns true if the SecPlane is sloped.
==Examples== {{noexamples}}
[[Category:ZScript]] [[Category:SecPlane]]
